heading: Today
text: Becoming mostly sunny, breezy, and cooler.
temperature: 60s to 70 north, low to mid 70s south

heading: Tuesday Night
text: Mostly clear, patchy valley fog, isolated frost.

heading: Wednesday
text: Patchy fog early, then most sunny.
temperature: Valley highs mainly upper 50s to mid 60s, some mid 50s north

heading: Thursday
text: Any valley fog burning off to sunshine.
